commit.message:
Ammend comment in MachCodeFramesInErrorFile to reflect changes to
extractFrames method.

Removes AIX-specific printing

- Replaces "--- current frame" with "Native frame" in print_callstack_for_context
- Modifies MachCodeFramesInErrorFile to accept "Native frame" for all
platforms
Use helpers from jdk.test.lib.Platform. Use isPPC where appropriate.
Fixes issues related to MachCodeFramesInErrorFile on AIX
